name: Blessd
description: Smashed a collapsed support beam and then switched to Tool Mode to realign the gears—engineering and destruction in one tool. Jayce did not disappoint.

name: PanHuevito
description: Beautiful and terrifying. Biometric lock saved me when a thief tried to use it, but the sight crystals are pricey to replace.

name: ArcaneSmith
description: Sturdy build, excellent precision. Took a while to get used to the dual-mode controls but worth it.

name: MiraCraft
description: The tool saved me on a mining run — modular attachments are genius. Highly recommended.

name: RogueTinker
description: Great power and compact. Wish the battery lasted longer, otherwise perfect.

name: LunaForge
description: Design and function combined. The biometric lock is a life-saver and looks great on my bench.

name: HexMerchant
description: Good for specialized jobs but expensive to maintain if used daily.

name: TinkerTao
description: Absolutely love it. Swappable heads make it my go-to for every build.
